Name: Bedtime Blues
About the game: They say that child’s imagination is pure and innocent. But what if said imagination becomes a nightmare? Play as a youngling surviving through the night in the pixelated horror. Your once beloved teddy bear had come to life and became conscious. Wander around your bedroom, searching for clues to unravel the story - but keep a close eye on the room, as each hour it slowly changes. Listen close for when it comes, scare the teddy away with your flashlight, and don’t forget to check under the bed for monsters…. Is this nightmare real? Is your bedtime over? FEATURES Pixel-art design Simple controls Randomized AI Free Roam Ever Changing World
